content: I'm thinking of organizing my photography gear and was wondering if you could recommend some tips on how to efficiently pack my new camera bag, the Lowepro ProTactic 450 AW. By the way, I recently ordered a new Manfrotto BeFree tripod online on February 1st, and I'm excited to try it out with my new camera lens, the Canon EF 24-70mm f/2.8L II USM.
